1. Download (as an archive) the intro_to_pandas folder that you find on Dropbox: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/v7uupzuc5d0aqn4/AADFOVGblTUkrNI7cBcBQtAca?dl=0

2. Extract the archive you downloaded.

3. Open a terminal (Ctrl-Alt-T). Make sure you are in your home folder:

	cd $HOME

4. To install Jupyter, run the following command in the terminal:

	python3 -m pip install jupyterlab

5. To launch it, use:

	$HOME/.local/bin/jupyter-lab

6. Using the bar on the left, navigate to the intro_to_pandas folder and double click on the .ipynb file. You should see the "Introduction to Pandas" notebook!
